text: I'm Chris Joyce ahead of surface access
here at Heathrow Airport as you can see
the scale is absolutely immense you know
from end to end it's about 33
double-decker buses it goes from down
here at station level all the way up to
the arrivals level of terminal 5 so
above us there are families waiting to
welcome their loved ones back to the
country unaware of the station
underneath them for me this is in a sort
of the biggest kept secret at Heathrow
and Heathrow strength has been built on
it's great access to the road network
the last 20 years is that's been its
strength but we know for the next 20
years we need to become part of the
heart of the the rail network and we
need to expand the airport by getting
more people on public transport we'd be
looking somewhere between 2020 and 2030
for this to be in operation
